label: 評定
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: Similar to hyōgi. Though never completely, it gradually became associated  with meetings of the hyōjōshū, the board of councillors" established in 1225 as the supreme decision-making body of the Kamakura Bakufu.　[評議､評定衆]　"
